pages.text: Given that punching foes and rock is apparently one of the most exercised activities in a game of Minecraft, $(thing)having extended reach$() would no doubt ease one's everyday life. Almost like it was purpose-made, the $(item)Arm Extender$() exists to fulfill that job. More-or-less equivalent to strapping a $(o)really heavy piston$() to the end of your arm, it $(thing)extends your reach by two blocks$().
